    • Constructor Detail

      • SnapshotWriter

        public SnapshotWriter(java.io.Writer output,
              java.io.FileDescriptor fileDescriptor,
              java.lang.String path)
               throws SnapshotWriterException
        Creates a SnapshotWriter that appends to output.
        Parameters:
        output - CSV writer that is being wrapped
        fileDescriptor - if non-{code null}, this will be flushed after each record is written to disk
        path - name of output, for logging purposes
        Throws:
        SnapshotWriterException - on any error
